titles.title: To prohibit aircraft from flying over the Ballpark in Arlington, Texas, during certain times, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/15/1995--Introduced. Prohibits aircraft from flying at less than a specified altitude over, and within a certain distance of, the Ballpark in Arlington, Texas, during public events. Imposes a civil penalty for violations of this Act.
